item.title: Accessing using OpenID Connect
item.description: Headlamp supports OIDC for cluster users to effortlessly log in using a “Sign in” button. For OIDC to be used, Headlamp needs to know how to configure it, so you have to provide the different OIDC-related arguments to Headlamp from your OIDC provider. Those are: the client ID: -oidc-client-id the client secret: -oidc-client-secret the issuer URL: -oidc-idp-issuer-url (optionally) the OpenId scopes: -oidc-scopes and you have to tell the OIDC provider about the callback URL, which in Headlamp it is your URL + the /oidc-callback path, e.
